CAS Utilities¶

CommonCASUtils¶

class CommonCASUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for manipulating Sim cas parts.

static attach_cas_part_to_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, cas_part_id: int, body_type: sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType = sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType.NONE, outfit_category_and_index: Optional[Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]] = None) → bool¶

Add a cas part at the specified BodyType to the Sims outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The SimInfo of a Sim to add the cas part to.

  • cas_part_id – The decimal identifier of a CAS part to attach to the Sim.

  • body_type – The BodyType the cas part will be attached to. If no value is provided or it is None, the BodyType of the cas part itself will be used.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The outfit category and index of the Sims outfit to modify. If no value is provided, the Sims current outfit will be used.

Returns

True if the cas part was successfully attached, False if not.

static detach_cas_part_from_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, cas_part_id: int, body_type: Optional[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType] = sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType.NONE, outfit_category_and_index: Optional[Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]] = None) → bool¶

Remove a cas part at the specified BodyType from the Sims outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The SimInfo of a Sim to remove the cas part from.

  • cas_part_id – The decimal identifier of a CAS part to detach from the Sim.

  • body_type – The BodyType the cas part will be detached from. If no value is provided, the BodyType of the cas part itself will be used. If set to None, the cas part will be removed from all body types.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The outfit category and index of the Sims outfit to modify. If no value is provided, the Sims current outfit will be used.

Returns

True if the cas part was successfully detached, False if not.

static get_body_type_cas_part_is_attached_to(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, cas_part_id: int, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int] = None) → sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType¶

Retrieve the BodyType that a cas part is attached to within a Sims outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The SimInfo of the Sim to check.

  • cas_part_id – A decimal identifier of the CAS part to locate.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The outfit category and index of the Sims outfit to check. Default is the Sims current outfit.

Returns

The BodyType the specified cas part id is attached to or -1 if the cas part is not found.

static get_body_type_of_cas_part(cas_part_id: int) → Optional[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType]¶

Retrieve the BodyType of a CAS part.

Parameters

cas_part_id – The decimal identifier of a CAS part.

Returns

The default BodyType of the CAS part or None if the Body Type of a cas part is not an actual BodyType.

static get_cas_part_id_at_body_type(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, body_type: sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int] = None) → int¶

Retrieve the cas part identifier attached to the specified BodyType within a Sims outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The SimInfo of the Sim to check.

  • body_type – The BodyType to check.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The outfit category and index of the Sims outfit to check. Default is the Sims current outfit.

Returns

The cas part identifier attached to the specified BodyType or -1 if the body type is not found.

static has_cas_part_attached(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, cas_part_id: int, body_type: Optional[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType] = sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType.NONE, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int] = None) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim has the specified cas part attached to their outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The SimInfo of the Sim to check.

  • cas_part_id – A decimal identifier of the CAS part to locate.

  • body_type – The BodyType the cas part will be located at. If no value is provided, it defaults to the BodyType of the cas part itself. If set to None, the cas part will be located within any body type.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The outfit category and index of the Sims outfit to check. Default is the Sims current outfit.

Returns

True if the Sims outfit contains any of the specified cas parts.

static is_cas_part_loaded(cas_part_id: int) → bool¶

Determine if a CAS part is loaded within the game. note:: If the cas part is part of a package that is not installed, it will be considered as not loaded.

Parameters

cas_part_id – The Decimal identifier of a CAS part.

Returns

True if the CAS part is loaded within the game, False if not.

CommonOutfitUtils¶

class CommonOutfitUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for handling sim outfits.

static generate_outfit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int])¶

Generate an outfit for a sim for the specified OutfitCategory and Index. note:: If an outfit exists in the specified OutfitCategory and index, already, it will be overwritten.

static get_all_outfit_categories() → Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory]¶

Retrieve a collection of all OutfitCategory types.

static get_current_outfit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]¶

Retrieve the current OutfitCategory and Index of the current sim.

static get_current_outfit_category(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory¶

Retrieve the current OutfitCategory and Index of the current sim.

static get_current_outfit_index(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → int¶

Retrieve the current OutfitCategory and Index of the current sim.

static get_outfit_data(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category_and_index: Optional[Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]] = None) → cas.cas.OutfitData¶

Retrieve OutfitData for the specified OutfitCategory and Index of a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to retrieve outfit data of.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The OutfitCategory and Index of the outfit to retrieve data from. Default is the current outfit.

static get_outfit_parts(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category_and_index: Optional[Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]] = None) → Dict[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.BodyType, int]¶

Retrieve Outfit Parts for the specified OutfitCategory and Index of a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to retrieve outfit parts of.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The OutfitCategory and Index of the outfit to retrieve data from. Default is the current outfit.

static get_previous_outfit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, default_outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int] = (sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory.EVERYDAY, 0)) → Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]¶

Retrieve the previous outfit a sim was wearing before their current outfit.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to get the previous outfit of.

  • default_outfit_category_and_index – A default OutfitCategory and index if no previous outfit was found.

static has_outfit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int]) → bool¶

Determine if a sim has an existing outfit in the specified OutfitCategory and Index.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to check.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The OutfitCategory and index to locate.

static resend_outfits(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo)¶

Resend outfit data to a sim to refresh their outfits.

static set_current_outfit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category_and_index: Tuple[sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory, int])¶

Set the current outfit of a sim to the specified OutfitCategory and Index.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to change the outfit of.

  • outfit_category_and_index – The OutfitCategory and index to change to.

static set_outfit_clean(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category: sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory)¶

Flag the specified OutfitCategory of a sim as clean.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to flag the OutfitCategory for.

  • outfit_category – The OutfitCategory being flagged.

static set_outfit_dirty(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, outfit_category: sims.outfits.outfit_enums.OutfitCategory)¶

Flag the specified OutfitCategory of a sim as dirty. This will tell the game that it needs to be updated.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to flag the OutfitCategory for.

  • outfit_category – The OutfitCategory being flagged.

static update_outfits(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo)¶

Update all outfits of a sim.
